examples: They became suspicious of his behaviour and contacted the police.
Ellos sospecharon de su comportamiento y contactaron a la policía.
You have a very suspicious mind (= you always think that people are behaving in an illegal or dishonest way).
Tienes una mente muy suspicaz (= siempre piensas que la gente se está comportando de forma ilegal o deshonesta).
Didn't you notice anything suspicious in his behaviour?
¿No notaste nada sospechoso en su comportamiento?
